title: Rajapakse’s Dilemma : Allegiance to China – National Traitor – Face War Crimes
content: – by Shenali Waduge – The plot thickens. The “friends” of Rajapakse’s are increasing and their baits are not hard to read into. The choices before Rajapakse seem few and their lobbies appear in the form of India and Japan on the instructions of the US. Essentially the President must be mindful of the traps…
